name: Milkman Clone
description:
You are a human clone that is programmed to kill the monster around your creator's area. Your energy source is Milk, so don't forget to drink it! You have given a special power though. That's the ability to release an electric pulse! It costs a lot of milk though.

Ok good luck, "ImAnIdiotK#261"

====

Our team:

KhiemGOM: Gameplay codes and ideas. 

BinDat: Arts and visual effects. 

TimDoodle: Sound effects and musics. 

Music in-game: Molten Doom (Tower Defense Simulator OST) - BelowNatural.
